<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all MP event handlers of the given type which were added by [[addMPEventHandler]]. Command needs to be executed only on one PC for MP event handler to be removed globally. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> objectName '''removeAllMPEventHandlers''' event </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> event: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> player '''removeAllMPEventHandlers''' "mpkilled"; </code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[:Category:Event Handlers|EventHandlers list]], [[addMPEventHandler]], [[removeMPEventHandler]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
